about_us: Connect your online and offline worlds
Unique open ring driver links your content and what’s happening in your surroundings
Crystal-clear conversations with high quality sound
Integrated V1 Processor for balanced high-quality sound
Precise Voice Pickup technology for crystal clear phone calls
Up to 5.5 hours of battery and a total of up to 17.5 hours with the charging case4
Ultra-small and light for a fit that stays all day
Control audio by tapping in front of your ears
Adaptive Volume Control optimizes sound to your environment
Quick Access feature allows you to configure your wireless headphones to Spotify, Amazon or Endel without using your phone,5,10 with just 2-3 taps.

All features: Every world.Always on.

Link your online and offline worlds with headphones that keep you in both. The all-new Sony LinkBuds feature a comfortable open-ring design that naturally blends ambient sound with digital sound. Stay authentically connected to everyday life while listening to music, taking calls, gaming, and more, all with dynamic sound.
Take a look around LinkBuds
All your worlds, always connected
See how LinkBuds keep you connected and in control of your everyday music by combining superior fit, open-ear styling with high call and sound quality.
At a glance
All your favorite features
Keep every world on
Hear calls and music clearly
Stay connected to the world around you
Be ready for the day ahead
LinkBuds are comfortable enough to wear all the time and smart enough to adapt to your life – keeping you connected to the people and entertainment you love.
Calls and music come through exceptionally clear, delivering an authentic listening experience.
LinkBuds keep you connected and in control of your everyday music by combining comfortable open-ear styling.
With IPX4 water resistance1 and long battery life2, LinkBuds keep you ready for whatever life brings.
Every world. Always on.
How to wear LinkBuds
Ultra-small and light
Approximately four grams in weight and extremely small, LinkBuds are a marvel of miniaturization. Ultra-small and light for a fit that stays all day
Crystal clear calling

Precise Voice Pickup technology performs advanced voice signal processing that allows the person on the other end of calls to hear you clearly, even through noisy surroundings. Our noise reduction algorithm was developed using AI machine learning using more than 500 million voice samples to suppress ambient noise and extract your voice clearly in a wide range of environments.
Authentic and natural sound
Our Integrated Processor V1 reproduces all the detail in your music with minimal distortion for an authentic listening experience. Enjoy well-balanced, high-quality sound with a clear mid-high range.
Give your favorite music a boost
When an original musical source is compressed our Digital Sound Enhancement Engine faithfully restores music to high-quality sound that’s closer to the original recording.
Wide Area Tap

Even with the small size of LinkBuds, they’re still incredibly easy to operate with Wide Area Tap. With this feature, you can double or triple tap the area in front of either ear to control your music playback. You never even need to touch LinkBuds to operate them.13
Adaptive Volume Control
Adaptative Volume control automatically optimizes volume based on your environment. LinkBuds adjusts to lower volume in quieter places and higher volume in noisier situations.13
Speak to Chat

With the Speak to Chat feature, the LinkBuds will automatically pause your audio as soon as you speak to someone so you can effectively have a conversation without taking the headphones out and will resume playing your audio.4,5
Multipoint Connection

For total convenience, these Bluetooth® headphones can be paired with two Bluetooth devices at the same time.14,15 So when a call comes in, your headphones know which device is ringing and connects to the right one automatically. You’ll also be able to quickly switch your headphones to either of the two devices at the touch of a button.
Control with your voice
One simple button press connects you instantly to your smartphone’s voice assistant so you can find directions, play music, communicate with contacts and so much more.6
Find your headphones with Fast Pair

Enjoy fast pairing capability through LinkBuds support with Google’s new Fast Pair feature. Quickly and effortlessly pair your LinkBuds with your Android device with just a simple tap. You can also easily locate your headphones by pinging them or checking their last known location on your smartphone.2,9
Easy pairing with your computer

Swift Pair makes it quick and easy to pair your LinkBuds with your Windows 11 or Windows 10 laptop, desktop PC or tablet. Pop-up pairing guidance appears on nearby Windows 11 or Windows 10 devices when pairing mode is selected.2
Quick Access to your favorite music & soundscapes

With Quick Access you’re just 2-3 taps away to your favorite songs or soundscapes. This feature allows you to configure your wireless earbuds with  Spotify, Amazon or Endel without using your phone.5,10
Made with the environment in mind
Your LinkBuds are not only designed to be stylish but also with the environment in mind, using recycled plastic materials for aesthetic parts and plastic-free packaging.8
Recycled plastic materials
LinkBuds use recycled plastic materials from automobile parts.8
No plastic in individual packaging
No plastic is included in the packaging material for LinkBuds, reflecting our commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products.8
Be ready for splashes and the day ahead
Listen anytime, anywhere with IPX4 splash resistance and enough battery power to last a whole day.1,3
IPX4 splash-proof and sweat-proof design
With IPX4 splash resistance and long battery life, LinkBuds keep you ready for anything that life brings.1
A clearer, more stable Bluetooth signal

For low latency and high sound quality, even around other interference, the Bluetooth® signal is transmitted to both ears at the same time. Thanks to the powerful Integrated Processor V1, you'll enjoy stable, skip-free, wireless sound.(A) Conventional L to R Relay BT Transmission. (B) LinkBuds L/R Simultaneous BT Transmission2
Listen all day, charge in minutes

Use the LinkBuds during your entire workday. With up to 5.5 hours of battery life and a total of up to 17.5 hours with charging case, you’ll always have your digital world with you. Quick charging gives you up to 90 minutes of playback after just a 10 minute charge.3
Small, perfectly formed case
An ultra-small, stylish, rounded charging case design allows the charging case to fit comfortably in your hand and your pocket.
What's in the box
Open up the packaging for your LinkBuds and you'll find 5 sizes of fitting supporter to suit different ear shapes, and a USB-C charging cable.12
Certified headphones for a personalized experience

With 360 Reality Audio certified headphones and the Sony | Headphones Connect app, optimize your experience by analyzing your individual ear shape, and enjoy the ultimate immersive music experience.13
Designed with the environment in mind
Learn more about energy-saving features and our commitment to the environment for a more sustainable future.
Sony brings you closer to the music and the artists you love. Watch exclusive videos and enter to win prizes only available for Sony fans.
Quick Access: With the  Quick Access feature by Sony, you’re just 2-3 taps away to your favorite songs or soundscapes on Spotify, Amazon Music & Endel, all without using your phone.5,10
A new sound experience for AR gaming: If you’re looking for new entertainment options beyond music and movies, the LinkBuds uses new sensors and spatial sound technology to deliver immersive sound for Augmented Reality games like "Ingress" from Niantic11,12. When playing "Ingress" with the LinkBuds, sensor and spatial sound technologies deliver a new experience: using head tracking, the sound is conveyed from different directions to line up perfectly with the action on the screen.
Seamless music and audio notifications: Auto Play delivers music and audio notifications when you need them.14 Music plays at your preferred time, such as when you’re putting your headphones on or starting to walk for a break, uplifting your mood effortlessly. Audio notification reminds you of all your important events, so your phone can stay safely in your pocket. Link with Spotify, Endel and music apps and get your favorite music and relaxing soundscapes.15
